eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Mississippi; at 08:08 PM ON DEC 12, 2025 Effective until 09:08 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: 3-month-old Paris Thomas of Vicksburg, Mississippi, Warren County. PARIS THOMAS is described as a black female with brown eyes and black hair. PARIS THOMAS was last seen about 1:38 pm on December 10, 2025, at the 2600 block of Roosevelt Ave in Vicksburg, MS, wearing a diaper wrapped in a blanket. PARIS THOMAS is accompanied by MICHAEL JAMES THOMAS and is described as a black male 37 years old 6 feet 1-inch-tall weighing 142 pounds with brown eyes and black hair. MICHAEL JAMES THOMAS was last seen wearing black pants and a white t-shirt. PARIS THOMAS is believed to be in danger. If anyone has information regarding the whereabouts of PARIS THOMAS contact the Mississippi Bureau of Investigation at 8 5 5 6 4 2 5 3 7 8 or 9 1 1
